title: Club Owner Name / Tag Error
body:
Hi,

I'm the owner of a club that I created a while ago, but I'm the only person of the club for which the name doesn't show up and my club tag does not appear  in game or on the friend's list. Can anyone assist with this issue?

Summoner Name: GΩdLike
Server: NA
Club Name: Existence Amidst Mortals
Tag: eX!st

It's been an ongoing issue but I'm getting around to pursuing it now. If anyone can help me with this issue I would greatly appreciate it.

replies.body:
Ayyyyy I love these easy requests.

-poke poke- 

Should be good now! Be sure to refresh your client if you still don't see that club!

{{sticker:sg-ezreal}}

Hi Broporo,

It's working fine now. Thank you so much, I appreciate it!!
